name: F.A. Sparkling Water
text: You can only equip this card to a "F.A." monster. The equip monster's level increases by 2. While this card is face-up on the field: you can send 1 "F.A." monster from your hand to the GY; Special Summon 1 "F.A." monster from your Deck with the same Level. You can only activate 1 "F.A. Sparkling Water" once per turn.
